title: PBE Champion Select/BlindPick/CustomMatch
body: When I open something while selecting a champion, like per say, Jihn's champ popup to buy his skin, when I close this, it will close, but the thing acts as if there and I cant click, go into game, or anything. Like the background of it to where its blurry and you cant click anything outside, that's whats showing there after closing these things. Also does it when changing summoners.

replies.body:
Hiya! 

Thanks for the report! Please report PBE issues on the [PBE boards](http://pbr.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/pbe/en_BE/bugReport/create). It better helps us track issues on live versus on PBE!

Thanks! ^-^

Actually, I logged in and was playing on Live with friends and it also happened there. Please fix. Really sad that I need to dodge, but thankfully it will go in game and remove it if I have my champ selected.
Gotcha, thanks for the additional info!
